title: Patch Notes
content: s. The entire basement of the Baldur's Mouth is now correctly considered a dangerous area. Jogged Nine-Fingers' foggy memory - she will now recognise you when you bring Jaheira to her after she asked you to. Removed a second letter from Tara's nest. Avatar Astarion will now correctly roll a passive Perception check to recognise the scar on Sebastian's face. Shadowheart no longer sometimes still thinks that Viconia is alive after having killed her. Poor thing. Sweet Stone Features, the condition
